name: webai-mcp-workspace
description: WebAI-MCP workspace for automated changelog and release management

scripts.version:bump: npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=webai-mcp && npm run build --workspace=webai-server
scripts.build:all: cd webai-mcp && npm run build && cd ../webai-server && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=webai-mcp && npm run test --workspace=webai-server
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=webai-mcp && npm run clean --workspace=webai-server
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd webai-mcp && npm install && cd ../webai-server && npm install
scripts.reset:deps: npm run clean:locks && npm run install:all

author: cpjet64
